Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored an early goal for England
Morten Hjulmand equalized for Denmark in the 34th minute
England's performance deteriorated in the second half, leading to fan jeers
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate warned his players to ignore criticism
Trent Alexander-Arnold's parting contribution was almost a glimpse of potential
Declan Rice struggled in the match

Criticism from pundits about the team's tactics and lack of cohesion
Ben Stokes defended the team against negative pundits
